{ftsAnalysis}

The goal of {ftsAnalysis} is to provide a set of metrics, index, analysis and visualization to better understand data from OCHA Financial Tracking Service.

This package enables the creation of detailed reports, with included automated AI analysis from 3 angles:

  • Donors
  • Recipients
  • Destinations

Installation

You can install the development version of ftsAnalysis from GitHub with:

# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("Edouard-Legoupil/ftsAnalysis")

The package includes a function to build data stories from each plot.

To use it you can use Ollama or Set the LLM inference API key in your environment with:

Sys.setenv(OPENAI_API_KEY = "<YOUR_OPENAI_KEY>")
Sys.setenv(GEMINI_API_KEY = "<YOUR_GOOGLE_GEMINI_KEY>")
Sys.setenv(ANTHROPIC_API_KEY = "<YOUR_ANTHROPIC_KEY>")
